page.title: 11Public Transport
page.content: There is no bus service through Dunnington. There are services at nearby Iron Cross. There are 48 buses in each direction per week. The buses are routed from Evesham to Stratford - on-Avon via Salford Priors and Bidford-on-Avon. Some of the buses run from Evesham to Iron Cross, Salford Priors, Bidford-on-Avon, Wixford, Alcester and then on to Stratford-on-Avon. There are no bus services on Sunday. In our survey we found that 27 people never travel by bus and 13 use buses only occassionally. 2 children travel to school using scheduled services, 6 people use buses to go shopping, 1 to get her pension, 1 to go to the dentist, and 1 to regularly meet a friend.
